All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ExchangeRate
Exchange rate bean/record.
ExchangeRateController
The ExchangeRateController exposes 2 API end points:
/exchange-rates/rate?pair=abx/xyz, which returns the exchange rate of the specified currency pair, and
/exchange-rates/supported, which returns all the currency pairs supported by this service.
ExchangeRateDAO
The ExchangeRateDAO interface.
ExchangeRateDAOException
ExchangeRateDAOException.
ExchangeRateService
The ExchangeRatesService interface.
ExchangeRateServiceApplication
The Spring Boot application.
ExchangeRateServiceConfiguration
The service configuration parameters loaded from application.properties.
ExchangeRateServiceException
ExchangeRateServiceException.
ExchangeRateServiceImpl
The ExchangeRateService implementation.
ExchangeRateServiceRedisConfiguration
The Redis cache configuration parameters loaded from application.properties.
ExchangeRateSourceDAO
Retrieves the rate data from the currency exchange rates data source URL.
